definition: books (in a library or bookstore)/CL:本[ben3],冊|册[ce4],部[bu4]
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

pinyin: Bo2 de2 li4 Tu2 shu1 guan3

sentences.english: Let me send you our catalog in English.
sentences.chinese: 請拿一本圖書目錄給我看看。
這種分類方式能幫助人們節省在圖書館找資料的時間。

sentences.english: The reading room of the British Library, UK.
sentences.chinese: 大英圖書館中央閱讀室，倫敦。

sentences.english: The total collection books excludes the books for rental.
sentences.chinese: 圖書種數不包括租型圖書。

sentences.english: The total collection books excludes the books for rental.
sentences.chinese: 圖書種數不包括租型圖書。

sentences.english: We don't tolerate smoking in the library.
sentences.chinese: 我們不容許在圖書館裏抽菸。

sentences.english: Just think – someone could gain points by getting a library card – how cool is that?
sentences.chinese: 你想想，一個人辦圖書證獲得分數，多酷啊。

sentences.english: Many libraries and archives now have historical digital image collections available.
sentences.chinese: 如今，許多圖書館圖書館提供歷史數字圖像資料。

sentences.english: Many libraries and archives now have historical digital image collections available.
sentences.chinese: 如今，許多圖書館圖書館提供歷史數字圖像資料。
比如說，“我們一起去圖書館吧。

sentences.english: He came out of the library, a large book under his.
sentences.chinese: 他夾著本厚書，走出了圖書館。

sentences.english: For assistance please call the Library Circulation Desk at extension 15112.
sentences.chinese: 若有疑問歡迎洽詢圖書館出納臺，分機15112。

sentences.english: Last weekend , jacob and i prepared for our mid - term exams in the library.
sentences.chinese: 上週末，我和雅各一起去圖書館準備期終考。

sentences.english: Moving books from the bookshelf is a hard work in the library.
sentences.chinese: 圖書館藏書倒架是一項專業性較強的繁重工作。

sentences.english: The library is too old . They're going go build a new one.
sentences.chinese: 這個圖書管太舊，他們打算建一個新的。

sentences.english: Library is an important composition part of teaching and scientific research in college and university.
sentences.chinese: 高等學校圖書館是高校教學科研工作的重要組成鄭分。

definition: entity/substance/thing that has a material existence (as opposed to a conceptual, virtual or online existence)/the real thing (as opposed to an image or model of it)
to read a book/to study/to attend school
for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]
paper/hard copy/printed (as opposed to electronically displayed)
